description:
9 sketchbooks  21 larger sketchbooks  6 portfolios  177 collages  (contained in 3 boxes, 1 wrapped bundle and 1 briefcase located in area 350 ).

Collection inventory, October 9, 2003:

1.  "Three Phases of Venus", a collage in plexi box
2.  "Trapped", a cardboard and wood collage
3.  Black portfolio (portfolio 1) containing misc. works on paper
4.  Black portfolio (portfolio 2) containing misc. works on paper
5.  Black portfolio (portfolio 3) containing misc. works on paper
6.  Stack of misc. works on paper (portfolio 4)
7.  Stack of misc. works on paper (portfolio 5)
8.  Stack of misc. works on paper (portfolio 6)
9.  Cardboard folder with misc. works on paper (portfolio 7)
10.  Unnumbered black portfolio with misc. works on paper
11.  Unnumbered black portfolio with misc. works on paper
12.  One box of collages and sketchbooks
12.  Piece of red paper and Bethlehem steel plate wrapped in paper towel
13.  Rectangular piece of black mesh wire with tag attached that reads "R&O Elevator", wrapped in paper towel.

During Tony Hale's visit in July 2003, he took digital images of the "portfolios".  The portfolios and stacks of works of paper were assigned portfolio numbers by Hale. 

Numerous personal affects belonging to Hugh Kappel were found among the art collection.  The personal affects were packed into ten boxes and shipped to Tony Hale in October 2003.  An inventory of the personal affects does not exist.
title: Collection of Hugh Kappel portfolios, collages and sketchbooks
